name: Cucumber Salad With Seaweed

ingredients.name: fuero wakame dried green seaweed strips

instructions: In a bowl, thoroughly mix the cucumbers with the salt by hand for about 2 minutes and let them sit for 10 minutes. Fill the bowl with cold water and strain.
Strain the seaweed. In a clean bowl, combine the vinegar sauce and sugar to taste. Toss in the cucumbers and the seaweed until well combined with the sauce.
Serve mounded on individual plates with a slice of lemon and sprinkled with sesame seeds.
